metadata.name: ZA_Self Portrait_2022_IMG_9327.jpeg
metadata.description:
my second NFT - made for trade with LC. I painted this on my Nintendo Switch in my favorite game's newest rendition which I play every day - Animal Crossing. (ACNH - Animal Crossing New Horizons) which was released in Spring 2020 . Within this beautiful game, it was painted on my Nookphone in the Custom Designs application, pixel by pixel. 

- ZoÃ« Argires, ZAA, ZA
